## data

```{sas, echo=FALSE}
data one;
   input trt_group time subject results;
   datalines;
1 2 100 20
1 4 100 30
1 6 100 35
1 8 100 50
1 2 200 40
1 4 200 25
1 6 200 40
1 8 200 30
1 2 300 25
1 4 300 40
1 6 300 45
1 8 300 55
2 2 400 15
2 4 400 35
2 6 400 50
2 8 400 45
2 2 500 35
2 4 500 35
2 6 500 20
2 8 500 35
;
run;

title;
proc print noobs; run;
```

## graph
```{sas}
proc sgplot data=one;
   title 'Study Results by Treatment Group';
   series x=time y=results / group=subject grouplc=trt_group name='grouping';
   keylegend 'grouping' / type=linecolor;
run;
```
:::
